mistral:7b-instruct:
Given your low income bracket and the presence of hypertension, the HMO plan from ahm (by Medibank) with a monthly premium of $260 could be a suitable choice due to its affordability and comprehensive coverage. This plan offers hospitalization coverage, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and telemedicine services, which aligns well with managing hypertension.

Moreover, the plan provides coverage up to $250,000, which can be beneficial for potential hospitalizations or medical treatments related to your condition. The maximum out-of-pocket (OOP) expense is capped at $7500, ensuring some financial protection against unforeseen healthcare costs.

On the other hand, this plan excludes coverage for cosmetic procedures and experimental treatments, which may not be necessary given your medical profile. By choosing this plan, you will be able to manage your hypertension costs efficiently while staying within your budget.
